//#include "stdafx.h"
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;
//using namespace System;
int max(int a,int b)
{
	if(a>b)
		return a;
	else
		return b;
}
int abs(int a)
{
	if(a>0)return a;
	else
		return -a;
}
int main()
{
    int tests;
	scanf("%d",&tests);
	while(tests--)
	{
		int m,n;
		scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
		if(m==0||n==0)
			{
				printf("0\n");
				continue;
		}
		int X=(m+1)/2;
		int Y=(n+1)/2;
		int mx=abs(X-1+Y-1);
		 mx=max(mx,abs(X-m+Y-1));
		 mx=max(mx,abs(X-1+Y-n));
		 mx=max(mx,abs(X-m+Y-n));
		 mx++;
		 printf("%d\n",mx);

	}
    return 0;
}
